Draw::MLcd Class Referenceabstract

Monochrome LCD. More...

Inherits Draw::MBitmap.

Inherited by Draw::MLcdDevice.

Detailed Description

This is an abstract class for drawing graphics and text on a monochrome LCD. The typical implementation will keep a copy of the bitmap in local memory and use the refresh() method to copy the local memory to the LCD.

Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

virtual int Draw::MLcd::hold ( )
inlinevirtual

This tells the LCD driver the memory is being modified and the screen won't be updated until it is released.

Returns
Zero on success
virtual int Draw::MLcd::release ( )
inlinevirtual

This tells the LCD driver the memory is done being modified and the screen should update on the next refresh event

Returns
Zero on success
virtual int Draw::MLcd::wait ( )
inlinevirtual
Returns
Zero on success
